name: Mark Elliot
text:
VNC seems to have a Java based API, there's a J2ME (Java mobile edition) application [here][1] which seems to have a really nice set of API libraries (and is open source, so you can look, and depending on your application, use).

edit: Actually [TightVNC][2] also looks really promising as a starting point.

[1]:http://sourceforge.net/projects/j2mevnc/
[2]:http://www.tightvnc.com/download.html
